name: Rootin' 4 Ya!
description:
Rootin' 4 Ya! is a 4-player local multiplayer game, where players compete to collect vegetables and sell them to customers at the Farmer's Market. Play as the Cat, the Dog, the Capybara, or the Donkey, and rush to collect the highest-demanded and biggest vegetables, and exchange them for points! 

Instruction:

Use WASD to control your character

Space to harvest vegetable

Sell your vegetable on the market, whoever gets the most point wins!

Note: Market selling is not complete so you can't make your way to round 2, but go around and collect vegetables! You can go into your corner and hit "Go To Market" to head to market.
